department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Request for Supply Arrangement for Buses, Electric.
full_summary:
================

**Title [Titre]**
----------------

Buses, Electric RFSA

**Reference Number [Numéro de référence]**
----------------------------------------

WS4095676068-Doc4095807190

**Publication Date [Date de publication]**
---------------------------------------

2023-07-12

**Tender Closing Date [Date limite d'appel d'offres]**
---------------------------------------------------

2023-07-12 is not actually the correct date, but the provided date is actually 2028-10-15T14:00:00.

* 2028-10-15T14:00:00

**Procurement Category [Catégorie de l'approvisionnement]**
------------------------------------------------------

Goods and Services (GDS)

**Procurement Method [Méthode d'approvisionnement]**
----------------------------------------------

Competitive – Open Bidding

**Description**
---------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit their proposals for the procurement and delivery of electric buses as outlined in Annexes A to C. The supplies must meet the specifications detailed in the Annexes.

**Key Dates**
-------------

*   **Closing Date and Time**: 2028-10-15T14:00:00
*   **Contract Commencement Date**: Upon successful shortlisting
*   **Contract Completion Date**: 2028-10-15

**Documentation**
----------------

The following documentation is required to be submitted along with the tender proposal:

*   A completed copy of the Supply Arrangement (SA) bid form
*   All required supporting documentation


**Contact Information**
--------------------

The Contracting Authority can be reached at:

*   Name: Jacques Legault
*   Email: jacques.legault@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Contact Information URL: (not included)

Please visit Ariba Discovery by [opening the URL here included in the original text](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16850967?extsite=MTY4NTA5NjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) to view the full tender documents and submit your proposal. Proposal documents must be submitted on or before the Closing Date and Time mentioned above.

**Trade Agreements**
-------------------

The goods procured under this RFSA are subject to the terms and conditions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPT
